sentence: Ms. PRESSLEY. Mr. Speaker, as part of the Congressional Field Hearing  on Haitian TPS Termination held in the Massachusetts 7th Congressional  District, constituents from the community were invited to discuss the  importance of extending TPS for Haitian nationals.…

Ms. PRESSLEY. Mr. Speaker, on January 20, 2026, I convened a  Congressional Field Hearing in my district on Haitian TPS Termination.  Senator Markey and Representative Moulton also participated along with  community stakeholders. I include in the Record my opening remarks:
